alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Lee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:16PM CDT until March 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lee County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oak Bowery to near Beulah, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Opelika, Valley, Lanett, Lakeview, Cusseta, Chambers County Lake, Beulah, Beans Mill, Huguley, Fairfax, River View, Amity Park, Oak Bowery, Southern Harbor, Lanett Municipal Airport, I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett, Rocky Point, Mount Jefferson and Bartletts Ferry Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
